node.title: Remote community electrical checks could have saved 11-year-old boy's life, coroner finds
node.alt: The town of Gunbalanya as seen from the air, with a full billabong.
node.description: A young boy who was electrocuted after climbing a verahdah fence in the remote community of Gunbalanya may not have died if cables and connections had been checked and maintained, the NT coroner has found.
node.content:
["A young boy electrocuted in a remote community may not have died if cables and connections had been checked and maintained, the Northern Territory coroner has found.", "Warning: Aboriginal\u00a0and Torres Strait Islander readers are advised this article contains the name and image of a\u00a0person\u00a0who has died.", "Rory was described during his inquest this year as a bright, happy-go-lucky boy. He was a \"very\u00a0fast\" runner, loved hunting and attended school every day.", "The 11-year-old died while climbing a mesh verandah fence at a house in Gunbalanya, where his relatives were staying, about 300 kilometres east of Darwin.", "\"The Power and Water Corporation had no systems to check that the connection was completed to Australian Standards,\"\u00a0coroner Greg Cavanagh said in findings published on Wednesday.", "", "
Rory's family have remembered him as a talented hunter and very fast runner.(Supplied)
", "Mr Cavanagh said there were also no systems for the inspection\u00a0and maintenance\u00a0of cables and connections to homes in remote communities.", "Rory had been dropped off at his relatives' house in October last year to collect a forgotten mobile phone and play video games.", "No one was home so he decided to climb the verandah mesh.", "The coroner found Rory died from the \"combined effects\" of an electric shock and the position he fell on the mesh fence, which caused asphyxiation.", "Mr Cavanagh\u00a0listed the electrical faults found at the house after Rory's death that day.", "He said the metal roof had 240 volts running through it and was not earthed, the nearby power pole was also not earthed and insulation on Power and Water's service lines was degraded.", "\"The failure to earth the roof and riser were not the only electrical issues with the house,\" he said.", "\"The verandah posts, beam and the mesh were also not earthed and there was an earth fault on the solar hot water booster.\"", "", "
The fence Rory was climbing when he died.(Supplied: Coroners Court of the Northern Territory)
", "Mr Cavanagh\u00a0also mentioned information he had received from an anonymous person who claimed to be a Power and Water employee.", "\"The person expressed concern about the lack of preventative maintenance despite the known hazards,\" he said.", "NT WorkSafe inspectors found the fault that energised the iron\u00a0with electricity could have happened years ago and remained undetected, Mr Cavanagh said.", "He found Power and Water was responsible for the electricity lines and connection to the house but had no records of making this connection or any inspections in the past 25 years.", "Likewise, he said the Demed Aboriginal Corporation had responsibility for maintaining the premises, including electrical installation, but had no relevant records.", "\"They have no records as to when the premises was built, who built it, who undertook electrical installation and what, if any, maintenance has been undertaken to the premises prior to 2018,\"\u00a0Mr Cavanagh said.", "The Northern Land Council, West Arnhem Regional Council and NT Housing and Infrastructure departments also had no construction or maintenance records.", "", "
NT WorkSafe says the damaged insulation on an overhead powerline made contact with a stainless steel wire.(Supplied: NT WorkSafe)
", "After Rory's death, Power and Water found other poorly installed connections at homes in Gunbalanya and Demed found more failures to earth roofs and riser poles.", "He said 45 defects were found during these inspections, including three services with degraded insulation, said to be from a suspect batch of service conductors, as well as\u00a0five with installation issues.", "In response to NT WorkSafe \"improvement notices\", Power and Water said it had now inspected services in all 72 remote communities and most outstations.", "The authority said an inspection and maintenance system would be in place in all remote communities \"within two years\".", "", "
Darlene Anne Wauchope is the mother of the boy who died in the incident.(ABC News: Kate Ashton)
", "During the inquest, the family's lawyer, Sean Bowden, asked the coroner to make specific recommendations about how Power and Water conducts future audits, transparency about money spent and a new protocol for remote communities.", "Mr Cavanagh\u00a0made two recommendations that:", "He said he did not think it was \"appropriate\" to make more-detailed recommendations about how Power and Water should conduct its business.", "\"That is particularly so as there was very little evidence of best practice in conducting such an enterprise when dealing with so many remote communities and outstations,\" he said."]
